actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional Federal district judges in the State of North Carolina, and for other purposes.
short_title: Justice for Western North Carolina Act of 1999
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Justice for Western North Carolina Act of 1999 - Directs the President to appoint one additional permanent, and one additional temporary, district judge for the western district of North Carolina. Specifies that the first vacancy in the office of district judge in the western district of North Carolina occurring seven years or more after the confirmation date of the judge named to fill such a temporary judgeship shall not be filled. Authorizes appropriations to provide appropriate space and facilities for the judicial positions created by this Act.

titles.title: Justice for Western North Carolina Act of 1999
A bill to provide for the appointment of additional Federal district judges in the State of North Carolina, and for other purposes.
